comments: a(n+1) is the permanent of the n X n matrix M with M(i,i) = i+1, other entries 1 . - _Philippe Deléham_, Nov 03 2005Supernecklaces of type III (cycles of cycles). - _Ricardo Bittencourt_, May 05 2013Unsigned coefficients for the raising / creation operator R for the Appell sequence of polynomials A238385: R = x + 1 - 2 D + 7 D^2/2! - 35 D^3/3! + ... . - _Tom Copeland_, May 09 2016
references: J. Ginsburg, Iterated exponentials, Scripta Math., 11 (1945), 340-353.
